Texts.Chs: 给你，船长！你自己的导弹发射器！以防你需要再造一个，我同时也会给你武器的蓝图。
Texts.Eng: Here you go, Captain! Your very own Missile Pod! I'm also giving you the blueprints for the weapon, in case you ever need to craft another one.

Texts.Chs: 为了修理你的导弹发射器，我需要一些材料。我需要至少^orange;8张高级卡凡尼特护板^white;和一张^orange;晶长护板^white;来制作一个新框架，一个^orange;阿威坎弹匣 ^white;来修理装弹装置，和一些用于点火系统的^orange;挥发液^white;。^green;带给我这些材料^white;，我可以帮你修好导弹发射器。
Texts.Eng: In order to repair that missile pod of yours, I need some materials. I'll need at least ^orange;8 Superb Kavanite Plates ^white;and a ^orange;Dranite Plate ^white;to craft a new frame, an ^orange;Avikan Magazine ^white;to fix the loading mechanism, and some ^orange;Volatile Liquid ^white;for the ignition system. ^green;Bring me those materials^white;, and I can fix up that missile pod for you.
